show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #9, Adam Issacs "Conventional wasn't good enough for me."
subtitle: #9, Adam Issacs "Conventional wasn't good enough for me."
summary:
Adam Issacs joins us today from the Texas Panhandle. As usual we take a deep dive into his story and how he got to where he is, what hard lessons he learned along the way that we would pay forward to keep someone from making a costly mistake. 


Contact Adam on Instagram: www.instagram.com/needmore_ranching

Resources mentioned:
GrassSnap App https://extension.unl.edu/statewide/centralsandhills/grasssnap/

Olson Ranch Livestock Marketing School http://olsonranchllc.com/marketing-school-outline/

American Grazing Land Services https://www.americangrazinglands.com/

Kiss the Ground Movie https://kissthegroundmovie.com/
